faqData.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqData.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about bookings, policies, and property features. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

items.question: How do I make a reservation?
items.answer: Simply select your desired dates, number of guests, and click 'Reserve'. You'll be guided through our secure booking process with instant confirmation.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All transactions are secured with bank-level encryption.

items.question: When will I be charged?
items.answer: A small deposit is charged immediately upon booking confirmation. The remaining balance is automatically charged 24 hours before your check-in date.

items.question: What is your cancellation policy?
items.answer: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before check-in. Cancellations within 48 hours are subject to a 50% charge. No-shows result in full charge of the first night.

items.question: How do I cancel my reservation?
items.answer: You can cancel your reservation through your account dashboard or by contacting our support team. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

items.question: What amenities are included?
items.answer: All properties include high-speed Wi-Fi, fully equipped kitchen, premium linens, toiletries, and 24/7 concierge support. Specific amenities vary by property.

items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: Pet policies vary by property. Look for the pet-friendly badge on listings. Additional pet fees may apply, typically $25-50 per night per pet.

items.question: Is there parking available?
items.answer: Most properties offer complimentary parking. Check the property details for specific parking information, including garage, street, or valet options.

items.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
items.answer: Standard check-in is 3:00 PM and check-out is 11:00 AM. Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request for an additional fee.

items.question: Do you require a security deposit?
items.answer: A refundable security deposit of $200-500 is held on your card during your stay. This is released within 3-5 business days after checkout, pending property inspection.
